## Toolbox.updateFlyout\_() method

Decides whether to hide or show the flyout depending on the selected item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected updateFlyout_(oldItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null, newItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  oldItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md) \| null | The previously selected toolbox item. |
|  newItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md) \| null | The newly selected toolbox item. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
